title:
Hi,

SN had a nice article about the local candidates\' positions on a variety of issues. However, I cannot find the article now. If you can post a link for that, I believe it would be a great service for all readers.  Thanks for considering.
text:
I believe this link to the StarNewsOnline.com election page will
answer your question: http://www.starnewsonline.com/section/news102
